price: Kila mtu miongoni mwao siku hiyo atakuwa na lake la kumtosha
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ
footnotes: Kila mmojapo katika hawa atakuwa na jambo lake la kumshughulisha!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
